question: When was 'Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2' released in the United Kingdom?
oriSent: 'Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2' was released in the United Kingdom on July 7, 2011, at a premiere in London.

question: When was the movie released in the United States?
predAns: It is currently the highest-grossing film in the Harry Potter series and well as in the Wizarding World franchise.
oriSent: The movie was released in the United States on July 11, 2011, at a premiere in New York City.

question: When was the DVD released?
predAns: 11 November 2011 in the United States and on 2 December 2011 in the United Kingdom.
oriSent: The DVD was released on November 11.
